com.vub.model

Class CourseData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vub.model.CourseData

  • @Entity
public class CourseData
extends java.lang.Object
    Standard CourseData class. Is included in the Course class and extends the properties defined in this class.
    Author:
    Sam
